```{r}
library(tidyverse)
#install.packages("meltr")

```

```{r}
babyname <- read_csv("data/i_names.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
View(head(babyname))

x <- babyname |>
  select(year, sex, n, prop) |>
  mutate(prop = prop*1000000) |>
  summarize(sum_prop = sum(prop), .by = c(year, sex)) 
summary(x)

x |> slice_sample(n = 5)
x |> count(sex)

x |>
  filter(year >= 1900) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = sum_prop, fill = sex)) + geom_smooth(method = "loess", alpha = 0.5, se = FALSE, aes(fill = sex, color = sex))

  

```
